alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 2:52PM EDT until July 22 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Cook County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 252 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lakeland to 7 miles east of Quitman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Lakeland, Valdosta, Quitman, Madison, Hahira, Ray City, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Cecil, Barretts, New Lois, Hamburg, Pinetta, Hansell and Lovett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
